subject: AI & Agents
title: Your Data Moat: The Real Competitive Advantage
description: A quick win: understand Your Data Moat: The Real Competitive Advantage.

hook.text: Everyone has access to GPT-4. Your proprietary data is what makes your product unique.

buildup.text: A data moat is unique, hard-to-replicate data that gives your AI a competitive edge.

discovery.text: Sources: user interactions, domain expertise, proprietary documents, and feedback logs.

twist.text: Data moats erode if you don't keep collecting. Competitors catch up fast.

climax.text: Design your product to generate valuable data with every user interaction.

punchline.text: The model is rented. The data is yours. Invest in the data.

quiz.question: What makes a data moat effective?
options: Unique, hard-to-replicate data that improves your AI
